roboguice.fragment
Class RoboSherlockListFragment

java.lang.Object
  android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      android.support.v4.app.ListFragment
          com.actionbarsherlock.app.SherlockListFragment
              roboguice.fragment.RoboSherlockListFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.support.v4.app.Watson.OnCreateOptionsMenuListener, android.support.v4.app.Watson.OnOptionsItemSelectedListener, android.support.v4.app.Watson.OnPrepareOptionsMenuListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
public abstract class RoboSherlockListFragment
extends com.actionbarsherlock.app.SherlockListFragment

Provides an injected SherlockListFragment based on ActionBarSherlock's Fragments. A RoboSherlockListFragment will see all its members and views injected after onViewCreated(View, Bundle).

Author:
Michael Burton
